events.body:
Have you tried a fresh compilation?
Eventually do:
`git clean -dxf` (DANGER! Removes all your local edited/created files)
`./autogen.sh`
`./configure`
`make -j`

If it won't fix your issue, try upload your config.log somewhere.
Please include the version (i.e. commit id) you are compiling.
Please topic should be closed, i have built it, qt problem

I'm stuck with the same problem and would really appreciate Your help :)
